Class CompileTask

java.lang.Object

org.eclipse.m2m.atl.emftvm.ant.CompileTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class CompileTask extends EMFTVMTask
Compiles an ATL module to EMFTVM bytecode.
